title: San Juan National Historic Site: Planning
body: Planning        Notice to All:   We are now accepting comments on the parks new Grounds Maintenance plan. You are encouraged to provide comments on the plan and can do so directly on the PEPC website located at https://parkplanning.nps.gov/.  The document is also posted on our website, www.nps.gov/saju and comments can be sent directly to e-mail us.  Comments will be accepted for the next 30 days, through the end of July 2016. In addition, Park Staff will conduct a Neighbor/Community Meeting on July 28th and the plan will be presented and comments received as well. Please let us know if you have any questions.   Draft Grounds Maintenance Plan      Walter J. Chavez Superintendent San Juan National HIstoric Site   Â    INTERPRETATION  Long Range Interpretive Plan    FOUNDATION DOCUMENT  Open House Presentation
